casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Lewis WRAY, Jr. 382P10-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. John L. Wray, Jr., For Wray, John Lewis, Jr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018." Beasley, J. recused
